item.description:
Michael Dimauro of the American Institute for Foreign Study, along with his colleagues, will be speaking about direct mail and how graphic design relates to it. The event will be held on March 7, 2007. Please arrive at 5:45 pm for mingling. Michael will begin at 6:30.

Outline:

AIFS Study Abroad - Direct Mail/Graphic Design

Mike DiMauro, Senior VP of Marketing, AIFS

I. Introduction
a.) The AIFS Family of companies

II. AIFS? approach to integrated marketing
a.) General overview
b.) The direct mail process and how it is incorporated into integrated marketing
c.) Demographics, list selection ? determining criteria
d.) Touch points and tracking


Kim Fleming, Creative Marketing Manager, AIFS

I. Over coming the challenges of Direct Mail
a.) Balancing regulation, budget and creativity

II. Graphic Design and its role within integrated marketing
a.) Branding programs and the big picture


Rhian Thomas, Director of Marketing, AIFS

I. Branding and its effect on web marketing

II. Web Marketing and its role in integrated marketing

Conclusion ? Mike

Discussion will be an open forum and we are hoping to have an interactive audience.
